name: Netica Text File
summary: A DNE file is a text-based data file used by Norsys Netica, a software application for building and analyzing Bayesian networks. It stores the structure and parameters of a Bayesian network, including nodes, probabilities, and relationships between variables. Netica and DNE files have been used in research, business analytics, and engineering since the late 1990s.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
